attacks.name: Charge
attacks.effect: Take up to 2 Energy cards from your discard pile and attach them to Lt. Surge's Electabuzz

attacks.name: Discharge
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy cards attach to Lt. Surge's Electabuzz in order to use this attack. Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Energy cards you discarded. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
